page.title: 20ABOUT THE CRUDWELL AUTHORS
page.content: The{Crudwell and surrounding area}work has been done by{Class 3 of Crudwell {Primary School}with their teacher{Mrs {H.Russell}during the{summer term of {1985.}There were 14 girls and 22 boys in the class.They were 8 or 9 years old.13 of the children lived in the area studied and the remainder came from nearby villages and hamlets.9 children lived on farms.This was helpful in doing the land cover survey.Children visited shops,farms and the blacksmith.{The whole class {enjoyed many outings and walks}to study the Fossway,Church, Playing Field and other amenities.Parents gave help by providing transport and information.They accompanied the class on outings and even supplied the plane for the aerial photograph.{Without the {parents and children this work would {have been impossible!
